posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? Moderator
2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): U.S.A, Eastern Time Zone
4) Current In-Game Name: |NNJG|Dimento
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Jerry231231231
6) Email Address: REDACTED@REDACTED
7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server: 3 Weeks, 1 week Donator
8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.) Moderation is all im afraid
9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team? Why do i? Well gmod is a fun game with many different options do play, like TTT, Flood, JB, and most the servers i play on have problems such as 1) Admin Abuse 2) General Problem makers like Griefing, Rdming, Hacking, Freekilling. Of course this happens in this server, but it is always handled with extreme haste, All of the staff i have spoken to was extremely respectful which makes this community a nice enviornment for me, and anything i can do to help would be great.
10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: 3 years of TF2, 2 Years of Gmod
11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server? TF2 and Gmod server, Gmod server was private and for friends. Tf2 server was public and open for 1 month and closed due to lack of money.
12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it? yes/yes
13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: I know i do not have the appropriate post count, but it will accumulate over time, If Jail moderation is the only thing accessible at the time, i will gladly apply for it.  I also want TTT Moderation if it is possible or applicable.
